definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: full moon (cf. Aram. kes0o0; orig. dubious, cf. Lag:Symn. i. 93; perh. As. loan-word; cf. As. kusêu, headdress or cap, = agû, id., and also full moon (as tiara of moon-god ?), Dl:HWB, sub kusêu, kubšu, agû; yet v. Brock)—´[[לְיוֹם הַכּ]] Pr 7:20; as a feast-day, ´[[בַּכּ]] Ps 81:4 (opp. [[בַּחׂדֶשׁ]], at the new moon).
